text: @neutralitas🚨 Ukraine war updates 🚨 Germany's Patriot missiles, UK & US metal ban, China's military parts sales to Russia 💥UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt: "Disabling" Putin's war efforts is best achieved when the UK acts alongside allies. 🇬🇧💪Meanwhile, China's tech sales to Russia are surging! 📈 US assessment reveals Beijing's indirect support for Moscow's war effort. 🤝🇨🇳🇷🇺But wait, there's more! 😱 Czech authorities uncovered a Moscow-backed influence op to "promote" propaganda in the EU. 💣 Lawmakers in Brussels received cash from Russia! 💰Belgium's PM Alexander De Croo, EP President Roberta Metsola & EC President Ursula von der Leyen call for unity against Russian aggression. 🇧🇪🇪🇺
